name: Short title
text:
ARTICLE 2.
SALES
 
Law Journals and Reviews
 
  Contracts and Commercial Law.  2 UH L. Rev. 247.
 
PART 1.  SHORT TITLE, GENERAL CONSTRUCTION AND SUBJECT MATTER
 
     §490:2-101  Short title.  This article shall be known and may be cited as Uniform Commercial Code--Sales. [L 1965, c 208, §2-101; HRS §490:2-101]
